abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews New York premiere of Bill T Jones dance piece Analogy/Lance: Pretty aka the Escape Artist, performed by eight members of Bill T Jones/Arnie Zane Company, at Joyce Theater.

headline.print_headline: Trying Hard to Capture One Body, Two Selves
headline.main: Review: Dance That Tries to Capture One Body, Two Selves

keywords.value: Analogy/Lance: Pretty aka the Escape Artist (Dance)

keywords.value: Jones, Bill T/Arnie Zane Dance Co
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: This second part of Bill T. Jones’s “Analogy Trilogy” explores the dual lives of a nephew and his club-dancer alter ago, Pretty....
lead_paragraph: This second part of Bill T. Jones’s “Analogy Trilogy” explores the dual lives of a nephew and his club-dancer alter ago, Pretty.
